title: Find Branches Containing a Commit
description: In Git, branches are used to develop features or isolate changes made to a project. Sometimes, you may need to find out which branches contain a specific commit. This challenge will test your ability to use Git commands to find branches containing a commit.

meta.title: Git Branches | Commit Tracking | Git Playground | Challenge
meta.description: Learn how to use Git commands to find all branches that contain a specific commit in a Git repository. Improve your Git skills and master branch management.
meta.keywords: Git, Branches, Commit Tracking, Git Playground, Git Commands

verify.name: Verify if found successfully
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 查找包含特定提交的分支
i18n.description: 在Git中，分支用于开发功能或隔离对项目所做的更改。有时，你可能需要找出哪些分支包含特定的提交。本挑战将测试你使用Git命令查找包含提交的分支的能力。

meta.title: Git分支 | 提交跟踪 | Git游乐场 | 挑战
meta.description: 学习如何使用Git命令在Git仓库中查找包含特定提交的所有分支。提升你的Git技能并掌握分支管理。
meta.keywords: Git、分支、提交跟踪、Git游乐场、Git命令

steps.title: 查找包含特定提交的分支
